dosage_instructions: Adults: 10ml every 4-6 hours. Children 6-12 years: 5ml every 4-6 hours. Not for children under 6.
warnings: Do not use if allergic to any ingredient. Consult doctor if cough persists for more than 7 days. Not recommended during pregnancy without medical advice.
side_effects: Common: Drowsiness, dizziness, nausea. Rare: Allergic reactions, stomach upset.

dosage_instructions: use only as directed by a registered medical practitioner.
warnings: prescription-only medicine. keep out of reach of children. store protected from moisture, excessive heat, and sunlight.
side_effects: common: drowsiness, dizziness, dry mouth, nausea. rare: allergic reactions.

dosage_instructions: Apply a thin layer to affected skin as directed by a physician (commonly twice daily). For external use only.
warnings: Avoid contact with eyes and mucous membranes. Do not use on infected skin unless advised. Minimize sun/UV exposure on treated areas. Use only as prescribed.
side_effects: Common: burning, stinging, itching, redness at application site. Less common: folliculitis, headache. Rare: skin infections or allergic reactions.

active_ingredients: Herbal blend (Unani) - not specified on visible pack side
dosage_instructions: Dissolve one sachet in a cup of hot water or tea and sip slowly. Use three times a day or as directed by the physician.
warnings: Keep away from sunlight and children.
For external use only. Keep out of reach of children.

dosage_instructions: Take as directed by physician or as per package instructions.
warnings: Keep out of reach of children. Consult doctor if pregnant or nursing.
